title: Senior Python Developer
summary: Lead the development of scalable web applications using Python frameworks and cloud technologies, ensuring high performance, maintainability, and security.
job_description:
We are looking for a Senior Python Developer to join our growing engineering team. The ideal candidate will have at least 5 years of professional experience in web development, with strong expertise in Python and related frameworks (Django, Flask, FastAPI). 

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications and APIs.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and implement solutions.
- Optimize application performance and ensure reliability across distributed systems.
- Write unit and integration tests to ensure code quality.
- Participate in code reviews and mentoring junior developers.

Requirements:
- 5+ years experience in Python development.
- Strong knowledge of Django, Flask, FastAPI, and RESTful API design.
- Experience with relational and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, Redis).
- Familiarity with containerization (Docker) and cloud platforms (AWS or GCP).
- Experience with Git, CI/CD pipelines, and microservices architecture.

Nice-to-Haves:
- Experience with message queues (RabbitMQ, Kafka) and caching strategies.
- Knowledge of GraphQL and async programming.
- Previous experience in e-commerce or SaaS platforms.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and performance bonuses.
- Flexible working hours and remote options.
- Opportunities for career growth and learning.
- Work in a collaborative and innovative team environment.

title: Full Stack JavaScript Developer
summary: Develop modern web applications using JavaScript stack, both frontend and backend.
job_description:
We are seeking a Full Stack JavaScript Developer to work on complex web applications. Candidates should have strong frontend and backend skills, experience with modern JS frameworks, and an eye for clean, maintainable code.

Responsibilities:
- Build responsive and performant web applications.
- Develop server-side APIs with Node.js and Express.
- Implement frontend interfaces using React.js and Next.js.
- Write tests and maintain code quality.
- Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other engineers.

Requirements:
- 3+ years experience in full stack development.
- Strong knowledge of React.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB.
- Experience with TypeScript, GraphQL, Next.js.
- Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress).

Nice-to-Haves:
- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and Docker.
- Knowledge of serverless architecture.
- Contributions to open-source projects.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and stock options.
- Remote work opportunities.
- Learning and mentorship programs.
- Team-building events and hackathons.

title: Data Scientist
summary: Analyze data and build predictive models to support business decisions and research initiatives.
job_description:
Join our team as a Data Scientist to design and implement data-driven solutions. You will work with large datasets, build machine learning models, and provide insights to support strategic decisions.

Responsibilities:
- Analyze complex datasets to uncover patterns and insights.
- Develop predictive and classification models.
- Perform data cleaning, feature engineering, and visualization.
- Collaborate with engineering and product teams to deploy ML solutions.
- Communicate findings to non-technical stakeholders.

Requirements:
- 4+ years experience in data science.
- Strong proficiency in Python, NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn.
- Experience with deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch).
- Familiarity with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop).
- Master's degree in Statistics, Computer Science, or related field.

Nice-to-Haves:
- Experience with NLP or computer vision.
- Knowledge of cloud ML platforms (AWS Sagemaker, GCP AI).
- Publications in scientific journals or conferences.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and performance bonuses.
- Professional development and conference sponsorship.
- Flexible working environment.
- Collaborative and innovative team culture.

title: DevOps Engineer
summary: Automate deployment pipelines and manage cloud infrastructure for high-availability applications.
job_description:
We are hiring a DevOps Engineer responsible for building and maintaining our CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and monitoring systems.

Responsibilities:
- Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines.
- Automate cloud deployments and infrastructure management.
- Monitor and maintain system health and performance.
- Collaborate with development teams to ensure seamless deployment.
- Troubleshoot and resolve production issues.

Requirements:
- 5+ years experience as a DevOps engineer.
- Strong Linux administration skills.
- Proficiency in Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Ansible.
- Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana).
- AWS or Azure certification.

Nice-to-Haves:
- Experience with security best practices and compliance.
- Knowledge of serverless and container orchestration.
- Scripting skills (Python, Bash).

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and bonuses.
- Remote work and flexible hours.
- Training and certification support.
- Collaborative and growth-oriented environment.

title: Mobile App Developer
summary: Design, develop, and maintain native and cross-platform mobile applications with great user experience.

- Implement cross-platform solutions using React Native or Flutter.

- Experience with mobile UI/UX best practices.
- Strong knowledge of app store submission processes.

Nice-to-Haves:
- Experience with mobile analytics and crash reporting.
- Knowledge of CI/CD for mobile apps.
- Portfolio of published apps.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and performance incentives.
- Flexible hours and remote options.
- Opportunities for professional growth.
- Collaborative team environment.

- Competitive compensation.
- Remote-friendly work.
- Opportunities to influence responsible AI policies.
- Innovative and ethical-focused team.
